title: Simulation-based LLM-assisted foreign language scientific paper analysis education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Terminology and Elementary Foreign Language Reading Comprehension
context.additional_context: Designing foreign language science paper analysis scenarios in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can summarize core concepts of foreign-language scientific papers with 80% accuracy using LLMs.
Learners can correct specialized terminology errors with over 90% accuracy based on customized LLM feedback.
Learners can evaluate the logical structure of foreign-language papers in three stages (critique, analysis, reconstruction) within a simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
